May 9, 2025: Dr. Reddy's Laboratories announced its Q4 and full year FY25 financial results.

Dr. Reddy's Laboratories and Sanofi Healthcare India Private Limited expanded their partnership to launch Beyfortus® (nirsevimab) in India. This drug is for preventing Respiratory Syncytial Virus in infants.

May 9, 2025: Dr. Reddy's Laboratories incorporated a new wholly-owned subsidiary in Vietnam, named “Dr. Reddy's Laboratories (Vietnam) Company Limited”.

May 2025: A USFDA inspection was conducted at Dr. Reddy's Laboratories Middleburgh, New York, manufacturing site.
